text:
Colin T. Trevorrow (born September 13, 1976) is an American movie director and screenwriter. He is best known for directing the indie movie "Safety Not Guaranteed" (2012) and the blockbuster movie "Jurassic World" (2015). He also co-wrote the script for "Jurassic World" and its sequel ' (2018). He will direct "Jurassic World 3" (2021).
Trevorrow was born in San Francisco, California. He grew up in Oakland, California. He has Jewish ancestry on his mother's side. He is married to Isabelle. The couple live with their two children in England.
